data.name: Dead Rising 2 - Sports Fan Skills Pack
data.detailed_description:
This special costume brings out Chuck's inner sports fan!

By wearing this costume, Chuck gains incredible sports fan powers, such as being able to drink as much alcohol as he wants without getting sick, gaining more health from food and winning more when gambling. Plus, attacks with sports-related items such as footballs and soccer balls become more powerful. Let's hear it for Chuck, and that Local Sports Team!
